data.text: @ChiPubSchools How about the 9 pages of adverse reactions? Whoever thinks this is ok to push onto the kids or adults.. is disgusting. And yes.. I will CELEBRATE on Monday when these kids can choose to remove the useless masks. You’re just pissed you’re losing ESSER $. 😉
@ChiPubSchools Or don’t and let your immune system do it’s job
